name: Okta
natural_language_description: 这是 Okta 节点。主要用于: Use the Okta API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new user
Delete (值: delete) - Delete an existing user
Get (值: get) - Get details of a user
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many users
Update (值: update) - Update an existing user

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The user you want to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID.
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User | 作用: The user you want to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID. | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | (必填项)

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | (必填项)

login.name: login
login.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 提示: Unique identifier for the user, must be an email | (必填项)

activate.name: activate
activate.description: Whether to activate the user and allow access to all assigned applications
activate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Activate | 作用: Whether to activate the user and allow access to all assigned applications | 默认值: True

getCreateFields.name: getCreateFields
getCreateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 默认值: {}

getUpdateFields.name: getUpdateFields
getUpdateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 默认值: {}

searchQuery.name: searchQuery
searchQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Query | 提示: Filter users by using the allowed syntax. More info.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

sendEmail.name: sendEmail
sendEmail.description: Whether to send a deactivation email to the administrator
sendEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Email | 作用: Whether to send a deactivation email to the administrator | 默认值: False

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
